synonyms.synonym: Neuronal voltage-gated calcium channel gamma-7 subunit

protein.specific_function: Thought to stabilize the calcium channel in an inactivated (closed) state

reference.reference_text: Burgess DL, Gefrides LA, Foreman PJ, Noebels JL: A cluster of three novel Ca2+ channel gamma subunit genes on chromosome 19q13.4: evolution and expression profile of the gamma subunit gene family. Genomics. 2001 Feb 1;71(3):339-50.
Chu PJ, Robertson HM, Best PM: Calcium channel gamma subunits provide insights into the evolution of this gene family. Gene. 2001 Dec 12;280(1-2):37-48.
